scripts.clean-install-all: rimraf pnpm-lock.yaml && pnpm install && rimraf ui/node_modules && rimraf ui/pnpm-lock.yaml && rimraf node_api/node_modules && rimraf node_api/pnpm-lock.yaml && rimraf im_library/node_modules && rimraf im_library/pnpm-lock.yaml && pnpm install-all
scripts.clean-install-locked: pnpm install && rimraf ui/node_modules && rimraf node_api/node_modules && rimraf im_library/node_modules && pnpm install-all
scripts.install-all: pnpm install && run-p install-library install-api install-ui
scripts.test:unit: cd im_library && pnpm vitest run && cd ../node_api && pnpm vitest run && cd ../ui && pnpm vitest run
scripts.test:coverage: cd im_library && pnpm run test:coverage && cd ../node_api && pnpm run test:coverage && cd ../ui && pnpm run test:coverage
